definition: to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: The Guardian I note did not favour me with an obituary.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到，《卫报》毫不眷顾于我，连个讣告都不登。

sentences.english: The phone rang in the obituary department of the local newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 地方报社负责刊登死亡讣告的部门电话响了。

sentences.english: The obit also thanked all department, teachers and students who cared this issue.
sentences.chinese: 讣告还感谢了所有关心此事的部门，教师和学生。

sentences.english: It reminds me of my university teachers, he asked us to write a personal statement.
sentences.chinese: 这让我想起了我的大学老师，他让我们写过个人讣告。

sentences.english: The cause was metastasized pancreatic cancer, Carnegie Mellon University announced.
sentences.chinese: 卡内基梅隆大学讣告中说蓝迪死于胰腺癌扩散。

sentences.english: The obituary didn't say that, of course.
sentences.chinese: 当然，讣告上没有这样写，而是说他死于心肌梗塞。

sentences.english: Death notice necrology martin was very shocked to see his best friend's obituary in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在报上看见好友的讣告，感到非常震惊。

sentences.english: Jano ran an obituary in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 哈诺在报纸上登了讣告。

sentences.english: Gertrud came across the obituary in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 格特鲁德在报上意外地发现了讣告。

sentences.english: I read Sewell's obituary in the Daily News.
sentences.chinese: 我在《每日新闻》上读到了休厄尔的讣告。

sentences.english: But it did list his "survivors" quite accurately.
sentences.chinese: 可是讣告上却精确地列出了他的“未亡人”。

sentences.english: Website of 》 of cable of British 《 daily telecommunications 28 days of cento obituary accuses partial content.
sentences.chinese: 英国《每日电讯报》网站28日摘录了讣告部分内容。

sentences.english: I am an excellent obituary writer because I am clairvoyant.
sentences.chinese: 我是一流的讣告写手，因为我是千里眼。

sentences.english: The Guardian, I note, did not favour me with an obituary.
sentences.chinese: 我发现，《卫报》都没赏脸为我出条讣告。

definition: to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
to live to the (ripe) age of
to mourn/to pay last respects/mourning/memorial (service etc)
to offer condolences (for the deceased)/to condole
